# This .gitignore file is tailored for Unity projects.


#VS
.vs/

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# User-specific settings
*.userprefs
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln
*.csproj

# Unity specific
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Unity metadata
/[Aa]ssets/Plugins/*/*.meta
/[Aa]ssets/StreamingAssets/*/*.meta

# Build artifacts
/[Bb]uilds/
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage

# Crash reports
[Cc]rashReports/

# Auto-generated files
*.dll
*.exe
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.class
*.jar
*.swp
*.lock

# Other generated files
*.meta
*.tmp

# Logs
*.log

# Exclude files from asset pipeline caching
/Assets/**/AssetStoreTools*

# Rider IDE
.idea/
*.sln.iml
*.sln.ide

# JetBrains Rider files
*.ipr
*.iws
.idea/
.idea_modules/

# Unity Cloud Build
[Uu]nity[Cc]loud[Bb]uild/

# Other temporary files
[Dd]ebug/

# Cache files
/[Cc]ache/

# Generated files specific to Unity Editor versions
/Library/Artifacts/

# Ignore ProBuilder autosaves
/[Aa]ssets/ProBuilder/Autosave.*

# Ignore Timeline preview caches
/[Aa]ssets/Timeline/Preview.*.timeline
